Try Searching For This:

item.title: Need help with making whole game non-pvp
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

hey guys. i started off with a pvp server ok? and i dont want to have to download and edit another source so i was wondering how do i change everywhere in the game to non-pvp with a simple code to add in/swap with another.

please please help!!! i just want my server to be fully non pvp!

i started off with a pvp server look. this is my code. how do i make them so they are the other way around? so my whole game is non pvp?:

[code]public boolean nonWildPvP() {
if (absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3212 && absY >= 3226 && absY <= 3218) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

private boolean AttackPvP() {

client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int offsetX = (absY - EnemyY) * -1;
int offsetY = (absX - EnemyX) * -1;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making whole game non-pvp
